title: Los Angeles Canceled School Vaccine Mandate After 30,000 Kids Did Not Comply | The Truthseeker
cleaned_text:
Los Angeles Canceled School Vaccine Mandate After 30,000 Kids Did Not Comply

Los Angeles Unified School District, the country’s largest public school district, was planning to implement a sweeping vaccine mandate for young students, but has been forced to u-turn after some 30,000 children did not in comply with the decree.

The Gates and Big Pharma consortium was dealt a serious blow before Christmas. Plans to coerce millions of families and their children into injecting yet another experimental mRNA gene-jab were thrown into chaos after tens of thousands of parents became informed on the risks posed by the controversial range ‘vaccine’. The establishment are now worried that this latest result might encourage families in cities across America to question the experimental injections, and could slow ‘guaranteed’ product sales of going forward.

“In September, the nation’s second-largest school district imposed strict vaccine requirements on children 12 and older, with almost no exemptions. The district blinked at the last minute, however, as community activists and Gov. Gavin Newsom questioned the idea of moving more than 30,000 unvaccinated students back into distance learning.”

“Other U.S. districts in blue states are scaling back previous student mandate ideas, too. School leaders in Portland, Ore., tabled discussion this fall amid vigorous pushback, while New York and Chicago have taken a wait-and-see approach. Not only are they wary of mandate critics, but they also question whether they should impose a requirement before the Food and Drug Administration fully approves vaccines for their students — a threshold Los Angeles Unified didn’t wait for.”
